landingPage.title: Kira AI - Automate Your Social Media Interactions

content.heading: Revolutionize Your Social Media Engagement
content.subheading: Answer comments and DMs automatically, quickly, and effortlessly with Kira AI. Let it take care of all your social media interactions while you focus on what matters most.

testimonials.name: Jane Doe
testimonials.quote: Kira AI has saved me countless hours by automating my DMs. It's a game-changer!

testimonials.name: John Smith
testimonials.quote: I love how Kira AI makes my responses feel human. My audience engagement has doubled!

features.title: Full Automatic AI Responses
features.description: Kira AI responds to messages instantly and accurately, saving you time and effort.

features.title: Draft Message Suggestions
features.description: Let Kira AI draft responses for you to review and send manually.

features.title: Out of Office Hours
features.description: Schedule when Kira AI is active and postpone responses to the next business day.

features.title: Human-like Delayed Responses
features.description: Set a custom response delay to make interactions feel natural.
